title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the alias name should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Double-click on the first column name.
Expected Result: The alias name should be displayed.
Actual Result: The original name of the column is displayed below, but the alias name appears as row["column1"] above after double-clicking.
